EmailTemplate.name: 21_M1_HNW_Global-Express_Nurture.Global Express Monthly 2: Primus Elite
EmailTemplate.subject: Global Express Monthly | Fly with more clarity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/supported-platforms/business-jet/bombardier/bombardier-global-5000-6000?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]> Improve your flight experience <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/supported-platforms/business-jet/bombardier/bombardier-global-5000-6000?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]> through the plug and play installation of the Honeywell DU-875 Primus Elite upgrade and benefit from better performance and reliability.*
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade/primus-elite?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]>
* Visit Bombardier's website for more information. Honeywell DU-875 liquid crystal displays "provide a better flying experience” Chief pilot of Spectro | Jet-Care
Primus Elite cockpit upgrades are specifically designed for your Primus 2000 equipped aircraft. Replace outdated CRT’s with Honeywell’s DU 875 high definition liquid crystal displays (LCD) which provide more clarity in all cockpit lighting conditions, are much more reliable and weigh much less than the original, now obsolete CRTs.
Choose Synthetic Vision and add new levels of situational awareness and safety—in three dimensions, and in color! Honeywell’s Primus Elite Advanced Features (PEAF) upgrades include synthetic vision system (SVS) which provides a three-dimensional view of surrounding terrain, airports, runways and obstacles coupled with advanced flight path symbology. We make it easy for you to take care of the passengers behind you.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade/primus-elite?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade/primus-elite?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]>
PRIMUS ELITE INCENTIVES <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade/primus-elite?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]>
Save up to $200,000 on your next upgrade—We’re offering limited time upgrade incentives to Global operators to help save money, reduce downtime and benefit from better performance and reliability.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade/primus-elite?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]> Flight advancements and technology are constantly evolving – your aircraft should do the same. You can count on Honeywell for the latest solutions available for your Global Express.
EXPLORE GLOBAL EXPRESS SOLUTIONS <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/global-express-upgrade?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_m1_hnw&utm_content=nurture]]> Want to Talk?
You can count on Honeywell for the latest solutions available for your Global Series aircraft. We’re ready to listen and help. Contact us for Immediate support.
Contact Us <[[mailto:perry.pelitera@honeywell.com?cc=lisa.watmore@honeywell.com&subject=Interested%20in%20more%20information&body=Hi%20Perry%2C%0D%0A%0D%0AI%20would%20like%20more%20information%20on%20the%20offerings%20related%20to%20Global-Series%20aircraft.%0D%0A]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]>
